About the Product:
DiSano Pastalicious Elbow is the simplest way to enjoy your favourite meal in just 13 minutes. It is made with 100% Durum Wheat Semolina and has no maida at all! It is also a source of dietary fibre which slows down the absorption of carbohydrates and fats in the body, thereby making you feel satiated for a longer period. It contains 0% trans fats and is rich in protein- an essential building block for muscles and bones. With DiSano Pastalicious Elbow have an Italian gourmet pasta experience at home! Explore a range of tasty, nutritious, and fun pasta options from DiSano Pastalicious only on Big Basket.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Doritos Dinamita Fiery Lime & Chilli Flavour Namkeen is a snack that ignites your taste buds with a zesty kick. These rolled tortilla chips pack an explosive flavour punch, combining the tangy zing of lime with a fiery chilli infusion. Perfect for those who crave a bold snacking experience, each bite offers a thrilling blend of heat and citrus. Whether enjoyed solo or with your favourite dips, Doritos Dinamita Namkeen promises a dynamic and flavourful journey that leaves you reaching for more. Elevate your snack time with the intense, mouthwatering delight of these fiery lime and chilli-flavoured Doritos.

From the Brand:
About the ProductNamkeen -Sesame Murukku is the snack you need to satisfy your hunger pangs and cravings and is the perfect munchie to carry with you everywhere. Perfectly blended with fresh and local spices just the way you like it, our snacky treats come with a spicy and sweet tadka and are naturally processed with the finest split chickpea flour and blended well with corn flakes, red lentils, and red chilli powder. Our Sesame Murukku treat is the one treats you need with your meals and is a traditional recipe that you can revel in at any time of the day and is sure to make your tastebuds dance. Added to any meal and accompanied with any beverage, our treat is a natural energy booster and is your choice for the perfect munchie which is ready to eat. Packed with flavour and nutrition, our Namkeen -Sesame Murukku has no added preservatives and no trans-fat and is the best snack to have in your pantry. Indulge in savour goodness with our Namkeen -Sesame Murukku now! Experiment with the eclectic range of Tasties Origin's Namkeen collections on Big Basket from Lahsun Sev, Indori Mixture, and more, where tradition meets flavour in local recipes.
Ingredients:
Rice flour, Edible vegetable fat (Palmolein oil), Gram flour, lodised salt, Chilli powder, Sesame, Garlic, and Compounded asafoetida.

product_desc: Masala Oats - Tasty Evening Snack, Fibre Rich, Curry & Pepper
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Saffola Masala Oats brings to you a range of delightful flavours making for a perfect evening snack. Made with whole grain oats, real vegetables & a tasty mix of authentic desi spices, Saffola Masala Oats forms a delectable warm bowl of joy. What's more, is that it is ready to eat in just 3 minutes - super convenient to make, super tasty to eat, and super hard to resist! You can also enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in a variety of tasty recipes like Crispy Cutlets, Penne Pasta, or just as a delicious bowl of joy with crunchy toppings like namkeen, peanuts or crushed papad. Saffola Masala Oats is available in a range of lip-smacking flavours - Classic Masala for the classic masaledar experience | Veggie Twist for the comforting blend of spices and vegetables | Peppy tomato for a tangy indulgence | Masala Coriander for the tasty mix of desi spices with coriander notes | Curry & Pepper with a lingering aroma of curry leaves. Made with wholegrain Oats & real vegetables, Saffola Masala Oats is high in fibre and protein keeping you fuller for longer, helping you control your hunger pangs and manage weight.
Ingredients:
Oats (74%), Maltodextrin, Salt, Dried Vegetables, French Beans [1. 16%], Onion [0. 69%], Green Peas (0. 47%]), Spices, Condiments (1. 3%) (Coriander [0. 34%], Cumin, Tumeric, Black Pepper (0. 3%), Chilly Ginger, Fennel, Fenugreek Curry Leaf Powder (0. 2%)), Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Onion Powder, Garlic, Sugar, Wheat Flour, Flavour Enhancers (627, 631), Anticaking Agent (551), Yeast Extract, Acidity Regulator (330). Contains Added Natural And Nature Identical Flavouring Substances.
Benefits:
* Saffola Masala Oats is a tasty blend of authentic Indian spices which is a perfect answer to your chatpata evening cravings!
* Ready in just 3 minutes, Saffola Masala Oats is super easy to make and super tasty to eat!
* Curry & Pepper from Saffola Masala Oats brings to you a lingering aroma of curry leaves and a crunchy mix of french beans, onions and green peas
* Made with wholegrain Oats & real vegetables, Saffola Masala Oats is high in fibre and protein keeping you fuller for longer, helping you control your hunger pangs and manage weight
* Enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in a variety of tasty recipes like Crispy Cutlets, Penne Pasta, or just as a delicious bowl of joy with crunchy topping like namkeen or peanuts
* Also try our other drool-worthy flavours - Classic Masala, Peppy Tomato, Veggie Twist, and Masala & Coriander

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Eat Nestle Munch Maha Choco Taste with your friends as you watch your favourite movie. Munch is a favourite for many of us as it brings back fond memories of our childhood. product_desc: K-Pot Korean Ramen - Spicy Kimchi Veg Meal
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Ride the new Korean Food Wave with Knorr Korean veg meal in 2 exciting spicy flavours - Kimchi and Jjajangmyeon - that are deliciously magical. Our ramen noodles are thick & chewy, which is the hallmark style of Korean ramen. Our Kimchi and Jjajang flavours are expertly crafted to deliver a complex spicy, sour & umami flavour, that will make your mouth water with every bite. Packed with 9g of protein and chunky vegetables, while being completely free from preservatives. The make instructions are illustrated in detail so that you don’t go wrong even if it’s your first time or you don’t know how to cook. All you need is 5 minutes to get a Restaurant-like Korean meal experience, in the comfort of your home. Let the fiery taste of our Korean Veg Meal complement the intense drama unfolding on screen, creating a complete Korean experience that's bound to satisfy your cravings and transport you to a world of delectable delight.
About Knorr: Just like you, we love everything about food, because no delicious meal is cooked without love. Love for carefully selected Ingredients, flavours and spices, or the aroma of dinner wafting through your home. Love for the people you feed every day; your family and friends, relatives and guests, the people that matter to you the most. With Knorr as your cooking partner, you can serve your loved ones nutritious and flavourful meals at home.
Ingredients:
Noodles: Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Thickener - 1420, Palm Oil / Palmolein, Wheat Gluten, Potato Starch, Iodised Salt, Yeast, Acidity Regulator - 500(I) And 501(I), Texturizer - 451(I). Seasoning: Iodised Salt, # Dehydrated Vegetables (Cabbage, Onion, Ginger), Flavour Enhancer - 627 & 631, Milk Solids, Potato Starch, Spices And Condiments (Chilli Powder (0.8%)), Oleoresin Chilli, Sugar, Maltodextrin,
Flavours - Nature Identical Flavouring Substances And Natural Garlic Flavour, Anticaking Agent - 551, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein. # Dehydrated Vegetables (3.1%) : Cabbage, Spring Onion, Mushroom, Broccoli, Bell Pepper, Zucchini.
How to Use:
1. Boil approx. 3 cups (425ml) of water in a pan.
2. Add noodles and veggies and cook for 5 minutes while stirring.
3. Turn off the gas, add Kimchi Seasoning and mix well.
Pro tip: Make it more nutritious by adding tofu, fresh kimchi and sesame seeds. Non-Veg lovers can add poached egg instead of Tofu.
Other Product Info:

product_desc: Pancake Mix - Chocolate Flavour, Makes Soft & Fluffy Pancakes
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Pillsbury Chocolate Pancake Mix is the easiest way to prepare fluffy pancakes for your kids in the morning. 

The Pillsbury Chocolate Pancake Mix is a great way to whip up some deliciously decadent pancakes for your kids. All you need to prepare this batter is to add milk to this mix. Pour the batter onto your pan, flip them on both sides and serve hot! These chocolate pancakes are even tastier when served with bananas, berries, syrups, whipped cream or even chocolate chips. 

Explore a wide range of ready-to-cook pancake mixes, cake mixes and more from Pillsbury only on Big Basket.
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Sugar, Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm), Cocoa Powder (3.7%), Baking Powder [INS 500(ii), INS 541(i)], Artificial Flavouring Substance (Vanilla, Chocolate), Milk Solids, Iodized Salt, Raising Agent [INS 500(ii)] and Colour (INS 150d).
Nutritional Facts:
Energy (kcal): 372
Protein (g): 8.1
Carbohydrate (g): 74.5
Total sugars (g): 27.9
Added sugars (g): 26.4
Total fat (g): 5.3
Saturated fat (g): 2.5
Trans fat (g): 0
Cholesterol (mg): 0
Sodium (mg): 677
How to Use:
Method of Preparation:

Mix all the ingredients together until uniformly blended.
Heat pan over medium flame and lightly grease it with oil.
Pour approx 40-45 ml (1/4th cup) of batter.
Cook the pancake for 1 minute until bubbles break on top and edges begin to dry.
Flip & cook the other side for 1 minute.
Serve hot with any topping of your choice like honey, chocolate sauce, fruits, etc!
Other Product Info:

About the Product:
Enhance your movie-watching experience, in the comfort of your own home with World’s No. 1 ACT II popcorn. ACT II popcorn is easy to make. In only 3 minutes, enjoy Hot n Fresh n delicious popcorn along with the delightful popcorn aroma. You can choose among different pack sizes such as individual packs, family packs and party packs, as per your need.
Relish your favourite ACT II popcorn, now available in various lip-smacking desi flavours such as butter, Sweet Pani Puri, Tandoori Tadka, Southern Spice, Butter pepper as well as international flavours such as Cheese Delite, Peri Peri, Thai Sweet Chilli and Tomato Chili.
Ingredients:
Popping Corn, Edible Vegetable Fat, And Iodised Salt.
How to Use:
1. Remove the overwrap.
2. Place unfolded bag in the centre of the microwave oven with the yellow front panel facing down and this side-up symbol facing up.
3. Set microwave cooking time to 3 minutes (may vary based on oven wattage) on high power. Start the microwave. Cook until the bag expands and the popping sound slows to 1-2 sec between pops and then remove the bag from the microwave oven.
4. Open the bag away from the face by pulling diagonally at the top corners of the bag. Enjoy Hot n Fresh popcorn.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
No maida, refined sugar and palm oil, not fried 100% Vegetarian. Easy and Instant - just cook the noodles for 5 minutes, drain the hot water and rinse with cold water. Add some veggies of your choice to make it a wholesome delicious meal. The single pack serves a minimum of 3 people, a healthy meal for every member of the family - little ones to elders. Come with an all-natural tastemaker made with natural spices to give noodles a delicious twist Foxtail Millet is a rich source of Vitamin A and Magnesium and helps build immunity. Switz is the only focused manufacturer of authentic, wheat batter-based, all-purpose spring roll pastry in India. Switz Spring Roll Sheets have high elasticity and strength. product_desc: Potato Chips Original Flavour - Classic Salted
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Relish the classic, Pringles Potato Chips in its Original flavour - the perfect snack, loved by everyone for its delicious taste and crispy texture. Uniquely Shaped - Pringles is known for its unique shape, perfectly seasoned from edge to edge, for full savoury goodness in each bite! It's light and crispy and comes in a can. Enjoy On Many Occasions - Pop a can to add some crunch to lunch sandwich, indulge in a midnight munch with your favourite drink, stay energized as you game — grease-free, pack it in a picnic, it’s always more fun with Pringles Potato Chips! Stackable And Convenient - Everyone's favourite stackable chips that are kept unbroken and sealed air-tight with a freshness that pops! You can even stack 'em up to innovate your own flavour combo. Original Flavour - Sometimes simple is best - enjoy your favourite stackable chips in original, pure tantalizing flavour of salted potato - it’s good enough on its own. Unlike other potato chips, Pringles Potato Chips are made from a mix of potato, rice flour, corn flour, and wheat starch.
Ingredients:

About the Product:
Saffola Masala Oats brings to you a range of delightful flavours, making for a perfect evening snack. Made with whole grain oats, real vegetables, and a tasty mix of authentic desi spices, Saffola Masala Oats forms a delectable warm bowl of joy. What's more is that it is ready to eat in just 3 minutes - super convenient to make, super tasty to eat, and super hard to resist! You can also enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in a variety of tasty recipes like Crispy Cutlets, Penne Pasta, or just as a delicious bowl of joy with crunchy toppings like namkeen, peanuts, or crushed papad. Saffola Masala Oats is available in a range of lip-smacking flavours - Classic Masala for the classic masaledar experience, Veggie Twist for the comforting blend of spices and vegetables, Peppy Tomato for a tangy indulgence, Masala Coriander for the tasty mix of desi spices with coriander notes, and Curry & Pepper with a lingering aroma of curry leaves. Made with wholegrain Oats and real vegetables, Saffola Masala Oats is high in fibre and protein, keeping you fuller for longer, helping you control your hunger pangs and manage weight.
Benefits:
Saffola Masala Oats is a tasty blend of authentic Indian spices which is a perfect answer to your chatpata evening cravings!Ready in just 3 minutes, Saffola Masala Oats is super easy to make and super tasty to eat! Peppy Tomato from Saffola Masala Oats has a mesmerizing taste of luscious and tangy tomatoes, a crunchy mix of carrots and french beansMade with wholegrain Oats and real vegetables, Saffola Masala Oats is high in fibre and protein, keeping you fuller for longer, helping you control your hunger pangs and manage weight Enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in a variety of tasty recipes like Crispy Cutlets, Penne Pasta, or just as a delicious bowl of joy with crunchy topping like namkeen or peanutsAlso try our other drool-worthy flavours - Classic Masala, Veggie Twist, Curry & Pepper, and Masala & Coriander

About the Product:
Saffola Masala Oats brings to you a range of delightful flavours making for a perfect evening snack. Made with whole grain oats, real vegetables & a tasty mix of authentic desi spices, Saffola Masala Oats forms a delectable warm bowl of joy. What's more, is that it is ready to eat in just 3 minutes - super convenient to make, super tasty to eat, and super hard to resist! You can also enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in a variety of tasty recipes like Crispy Cutlets and penne Pasta, or just as a delicious bowl of joy with crunchy toppings like namkeen, peanuts or crushed papad. Saffola Masala Oats is available in a range of lip-smacking flavours - Classic Masala for the classic masaledar experience, Veggie Twist for the comforting blend of spices and vegetables, Peppy tomato for a tangy indulgence, Masala Coriander for the tasty mix of desi spices with coriander notes, Curry & Pepper with a lingering aroma of curry leaves. Made with wholegrain Oats & real vegetables, Saffola Masala Oats are high in fibre and protein keeping you fuller for longer, helping you control your hunger pangs and manage weight.
Ingredients:
Rolled Oats (75%), Maltodextrin, Spices and Condiments (5.8%) (Onion, Pepper, Garlic, Coriander, Cumin, Fenugreek, Ginger, Turmeric, Cinnamon, Clove), iodised Salt, Sugar, Dried Vegetables [Carrot, French Beans, Tomato (0.3%)], Natural Flavouring Substances, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Nature-identical Flavouring Substances, Flavour Enhancer (INS 627, INS 631), Wheat Powder ALLERGEN ADVICE: CONTAINS OATS, WHEAT & SOY
Benefits:
A tasty blend of authentic Indian spices, perfect for satisfying chatpata evening cravings.
Ready in just 3 minutes, making it quick and easy to prepare.
Peppy Tomato flavour offers a mesmerizing taste with luscious and tangy tomatoes, along with a crunchy mix of carrots and French beans.
Made with wholegrain oats and real vegetables, it is high in fibre and protein, helping you stay fuller for longer and manage weight.
Versatile usage allows you to enjoy Saffola Masala Oats in various tasty recipes such as Crispy Cutlets and penne Pasta, or as a delicious bowl with crunchy toppings like Namkeen or peanuts.
Explore other delightful flavours, including Classic Masala, Veggie Twist, Curry and Pepper, and Masala and coriander.

About the Product:
Mother's Recipe Dhania Pudina Chutney is a delicious and versatile coriander mint chutney. It provides you with the perfect balance between the freshest ingredients from our farms, and a delicious base. This delicious chutney can be used as an accompaniment to a wide array of cuisines for enhancing the flavour of many dishes. It can be used as a healthy dipping sauce for many of your favourite Indian snacks, as well as a zingy, fresh sauce for vegetables, cheese dishes, grains and salads. It enhances appetite and cures diseases like nausea.

About the Product:
This deliciously light and fluffy snack comes to you from Gujarat. This finger-licking traditional snack can be rustled up in an instant to satisfy those hunger pangs.
How to Use:
Mix 1 measure of MTR Khaman Dhokla mix with 4 tbsp cooking oil and 1 by 2 measure water to form a smooth batter.Grease 2 baking trays/plates with little oil and pour equal quantities of batter into each tray/plate (So as to obtain required thickness and proper puffing of the dhoklas).Steam the batter on high flame for 15 minutes. Sprinkle sugar syrup on the steamed batter.For sugar syrup - Take 4 tbsp water and 1 tbsp sugar, mix well and boil for 1 minute.For seasoning - Heat 1 tbsp edible oil, add 1 by 4 tsp mustard and a pinch of Asafoetida (Hing), cool the Dhokla slightly, evenly spread the seasoning on top.Garnish with grated coconut and finely cut coriander leaves.Cut into cubes and serve.

About the Product:
Yogabar's Energy Bars contain a nutrient-dense primary ingredient that is generally whole grains, nuts or seeds. The bar contains 25 - 30% Whole grains & complex carbs, derived from Brown rice, Oats, Buckwheat, etc. 10 - 15% Nuts, that is generally Almonds, Cashews or Peanuts, as they provide all-round more protein and fibre. Lastly, it contains 10 - 15% Seeds, which are generally Flax, Chia, Sunflower, etc. The bars contain no corn syrup, artificial sweeteners or hydrogenated oils. It also contains no artificial preservatives, as Yoga Bar chooses to focus on the long-term health of their consumers, rather than a product that can last years on the shelf. Flavour: Nuts & Seeds. Weight: 38 g.
Ingredients:
Whole Grains 27% (brown Rice), Millets (saamai. Foxtail, Rolled Oats) 15%, Honey 20%, Seeds 19% (sunflower, Sesame, Chia), Almonds 16%, Dates, Rice Crispies, Peanut Protein Powder, Palm Sugar, Cinnamon. Contains Added Natural Flavouring Substance (Rosemary Extract). Allergen Information: Products Are Processed On Machinery In A Plant That Also Processes Peanuts, Tree Nuts, Sesame, Soy And Dairy Products.
How to Use:
These delicious energy bars can be consumed as a pre or post-workout snack, as a protein and fibre-packed snack or as a meal replacement.
Store in a cool, hygienic & dry place.

About the Product:
Each & every bite of these momos will give you an authentic taste of hills, served with popular wow momo sauce. Momos are a kind of dumpling that is like Chinese potstickers. It is made from high-quality ingredients. Wow Momo brings to you Darjeeling Veg momo that is a blend of tasty, delectable vegetables and spices to create a riot of flavours in your mouth. It is a treat for all momo lovers out there. This momo is thinly wrapped and generously stuffed with the best quality delicious vegetables, spices, and herbs. It is an excellent low-calorie dish with a reliable source of fibre and vitamins. This versatile dish can be made with various fillings. Now you can eat momos at home without any hassle you just need to microwave or steam them.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Taali Salted Roasted Peanuts 160g Pouch is the perfect snack for cocktail nights with friends. 

These Taali Salted Roasted Peanuts are gluten-free and rich in protein. They make the perfect side for drinks, cocktails, mocktails and more. Peanuts help prevent heart disease by lowering cholesterol levels. They can also stop small blood clots from forming and reduce your risk of having a heart attack or stroke. Foods with a lot of protein can help you feel full with fewer calories. Serve these crunchy peanuts at your next house party!

Explore the wide range of crunchy and delicious Makhana and Peanut snacks from Taali in various flavours only on Big Basket.

About the Product:
Bakarwadi originated in Maharashtra and is popular in the regions of Maharashtra and Gujarat. However, these snacks can now be enjoyed anywhere in India with Tasties Origins snacks. Bhakarwadi which once originated in Maharasthra is today consumed by Indians residing all over the world. 
Bakarwadi is made from gram flour or besan and maida. Some of the active ingredients are grounded spices, chillies, etc. The mixture is added to a dough and made into spirals and then fried till it gets crispy. It is a popular evening and teatime snack.
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Bengal Gram Flour (Besan), Refined Vegetable Oil (Palm olein), Sugar, Salt, Spices (Dry Mango Powder, Ginger Powder, Coriander Powder, Red Chilli Powder, Aniseed, Cumin, Cassia Leaf, Black Pepper, Cassia Bark, Clove, Black Cardamom, Star Anise, Turmeric), Tamarind, Green Chilli, Sesame Seed, Asafoetida.

About the Product:
Kissan Chilli Tomato Sauce is made with 100% real Tomatoes and spicy Chillies. Enjoy the delicious blend of tangy and spicy taste in Kissan Chilli Tomato sauce! Use this chilli sauce as a replacement to green chilli sauce or as spicy chilli chutney or a chilli spread with hot pakoras, samosa or idli and you cannot find a better match for this hottest chilli tomato sauce. This ketchup compliments desi Chinese, south Indian and north Indian meals with finesse. It's addictive - relish the taste of tomatoes and red chillies in your meal Instead of Tabasco sauce, BBQ sauce or Chipotle sauce to add a unique twist to a regular meal.
Started in 1934, Kissan is one of the most popular food brands in India. At Kissan, we keep the farmer's interest in mind every step of the way. True To Its Name, Kissan works with over 8, 000 farmers who grow tomatoes for Kissan Ketchup and sauce. The brand reassures mothers that they can turn any healthy but boring meal into a fun ketchup recipe with Kissan Ketchup and sauce ranges! The tangy red burst of tomatoes in ketchup and red chillies will give you the sensorial delight of natural goodness.
Ingredients:
Tomato Paste, Water.

product_desc: Dark Chocolate Muesli - Nuts & Berries, Rich In Antioxidants, Ready To Eat Breakfast
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Your dull breakfast days are over! Start your day with a delectable, guilt-free delight with True Elements Dark Chocolate Muesli. Dark Chocolate Muesli is a perfect blend of wholesome ingredients like 100% whole grains like Rolled Oats, Wheat flakes & Jowars flakes, crunchy seeds & nuts and sweetened with jaggery and Raw honey. Wheat flakes & rolled oats are coated with Alkalised Cocoa Powder to reduce the side effects of cocoa powder like bloating, constipation etc. This antioxidant-rich muesli is sweetened with Jaggery and Raw Honey to avoid the consumption of empty calories through refined sugar. This guilt-free muesli can give an energizing start to your day when consumed along with milk. The wholesome ingredients can keep your sudden hunger pangs at bay.
Ingredients:
Rolled Oats (22.5%), Wheat Flakes (18.6%), Jowar Flakes (13.7%), Seeds (13.7%- Pumpkin, Watermelon, Flax), Jaggery Powder (7.8%), Almonds (5.4%), Dried Cranberries (5%-cranberries, Sugar, Sunflower Oil), Natural Alkalised Cocoa Powder (5%), Freeze Dried Black Currant, Raw Honey, Natural Chocolate Flavour.
Benefits:
- Made of 100% whole grains
- Whole grains coated with alkalised Cocoa powder
- Sweetened with honey & jaggery instead of refined sugar
- Great for weight loss
- Keeping hunger at bay "
How to Use:
Muesli can be served with hot/cold milk. It can be used as a topping on yoghurt, curd, ice cream, salad, etc.
Make on-the-go muesli bars or energy balls. You can directly consume it as a snack as well.

Store in a sealed container in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture to avoid the risk of infestation. Do not use if the pack is open or leaking.

About the Product:
Precia brings to you a unique mixed veg blend that is sorted and frozen using advanced individual quick-freezing techniques and packed in our state-of-the-art facilities which help retain maximum freshness. With no added preservatives, chemicals or artificial colours get the best quality mixed veg from Precia.Precia 5 Mix Vegetable is a versatile and convenient blend of five nutritious vegetables: green peas, cauliflower, carrots, potatoes, and French beans. This vibrant mix offers a balanced combination of flavours, textures, and colours, making it perfect for a variety of dishes. Whether used in stir-fries, soups, stews, or salads, this mix provides a quick and easy way to incorporate more vegetables into your meals. Each vegetable is carefully selected and frozen to preserve its freshness and nutritional value, ensuring that you get the best quality and taste with every serving of Precia 5 Mix Vegetable.
Ingredients:
Green Peas, Cauliflower, Carrot, Potato & French Beans
How to Use:
Pour the required quantity of mixed veg in lightly boiling water.Bring back to boil, cover and let simmer for 3*4 minutes.Remove from the boiling water and the mix veg is ready to use.

product_desc: All Rounder - Thin, Light & Crunchy Potato Biscuit With Chatpata Masala Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Have you been longing for a masaledaar snack that's perfect for any time of day? Then look no further than Sunfeast All-Rounder Chatpata Masala, our delicious masala-flavoured potato biscuits! These thin, light, and crunchy treats are packed with flavour and are sure to satisfy your cravings.
Savour potato in an all-new thin, light, crunchy and chatpata avatar! The potato in the base offers the biscuit a uniquely light, crunchy texture, and the seasoning gives them an extra kick of masaledaar flavour. The irresistible mix of salty and spicy flavours makes Sunfeast All Rounder a perfect snack to enjoy with a cup of tea or coffee.
Not only are these crunchy potato biscuits delicious, but they're also lightweight and easy to take on the go. Whether you're at work, at school, or out running errands, you can enjoy a tasty snack without feeling weighed down. Need something to break the monotony of your routine? Rely on Sunfeast All-Rounder.
So why wait? Try Sunfeast All Rounder Chatpata Masala potato biscuits today and experience the perfect balance of flavour and crunch!
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Refined Palm Oil, Sugar, Refined Palmolein, Dehydrated Potato [potato (4.5%), Emulsifier (Ins 471), Stabilizer (Ins 450(;), And Antioxidants (Ins 223, Ins 330)], Liquid Glucose, Starch, Iodized Salt, Invert Syrup, Milk Solids, Raising Agents [ins 500 (I), Ins 503(In)], Emulsifiers (Ins 322(0), Ins 471, Ins 472e) And Flour Treatment Agents (Ins 223, Ins 1.101(0)]. Contains Added Flavour(S) (Nature Identical Flavouring Substances) Contains Wheat, Milk Solids, Soya And Sulphites
Nutritional Facts:
Nutritional value as per 100 g

Energy: 484 kcal
Protein: 8.0 g
Carbohydrate 66.1 g
Total Sugar: 14.8 g
Added Sugar: 10.9 g
Total Fat: 20.9 g
Trans Fat 0.03 g S
Saturated Fat: 10.6 g
Sodium: 898.4 mg
Cholesterol: 0 mg
Features:
Potato in an avatar you’ve never seen before the delectable and irresistible Sunfeast All-Rounder.
The potato biscuits are seasoned with a special blend of spices to give them that mouth-watering masala flavour that everyone loves.
Packed with the bold and delicious flavour of masala, it is a lip-smacking mix of salty, and spicy.
The delightfully thin and light Sunfeast All Rounder is the perfect combination of crunch and flavour.
Perfect for any occasion, whether it's a quick snack on the go or an evening treat with friends and family.

product_desc: Corn Flakes Plus Original Healthier - Added Fibre
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Fibre rich delight, combining the timeless taste of golden corn flakes with an extra dose of added dietary fibre (Oligofructose & Wheat Fibre). The added fibre is your ally in slowing down the absorption of sugars, effectively reducing the Glycemic Index (GI). Our corn flakes are light, crispy, low in fat and a delightfully toasted for perfect morning meal. Naturally Cholesterol-free, Bagrry’s Corn Flakes+ ensures a wholesome start to your day.

Serve it with milk or curd/yoghurt and top it with fresh fruits such as bananas, strawberry or mangoes, dry fruits, honey and enjoy a nourishing breakfast cereal.

About the Product:

About the Product:
There’s nothing quite like that first, crunchy bite of a piping hot, freshly made samosa made with crispy Switz Samosa Patti (Samosa Dough Sheets). Switz Samosa Patti is a traditional dough-based thin samosa pastry, made of wheat, easy to use and very pocket-friendly. It can be fried as well as baked (at 180-degree Celsius or till its golden brown). Known the world over for its crispiness, you can wrap Switz Samosa Patti around any filling of your choice – let your creativity flow, and see the food magic you create at home. Switz Samosa Patti Filling suggestions: Corn and cheese, mix veg, spinach and paneer, chocolate and dry fruits, kheema (minced mutton), egg and dal, chicken and capsicum, chana daal/daal (navtad), etc. Switz samosa Patti is versatile to use and can be used in many other forms, like nachos, pizza cones, fried noodles, etc.
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida - Gluten), Water, Salt, Edible Vegetable Fat, Preservative E282.
How to Use:
1. Thaw for 45-60 minutes. 2. Fold the sheet to form a triangle. 3. Fold Further into the shape of a cone. 4. Put your filling into the cone. 5. Fold Further and add flour Paste to Seal.

product_desc: Pancake Mix - Butterscotch Flavour, Makes Soft & Fluffy Pancakes
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Pillsbury Butterscotch Pancake Mix is super simple and makes your morning routine seamless. The Pillsbury Butterscotch Pancake Mix is the easiest way to whip up fluffy, soft and ultra-delicious breakfast goodies at home. These butterscotch pancakes are the ideal treat for mornings, evenings or even as a snack! Pair these pancakes with maple syrup, chopped-up fruits and berries, some cream or even honey to enhance the experience and enjoy truly delectable tastes. Explore a wide range of ready-to-cook pancake mixes, cake mixes and more from Pillsbury only on Big Basket.
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Sugar, Butterscotch Bits (7.0%)[Sugar, Edible Vegetable Fat (Hydrogenated), Iodized Salt and Artificial Flavouring Substances (Butterscotch)], Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm), Baking Powder [INS500(ii), INS541(i)], Iodized Salt, Artificial Flavouring Substances (Caramel, Butterscotch) and Raising Agent [INS500(ii)].
Nutritional Facts:
Energy (kcal): 381
Protein (g): 8.2
Carbohydrate (g): 73.2
Total sugars (g): 20.6
Added sugars (g): 19.7
Total Fat (g): 5.8
Saturated fat (g): 2.7
Trans fat (g): 0
Cholesterol (mg): 0
Sodium (mg): 728
How to Use:
Method of Preparation:

Mix all the ingredients together until uniformly blended.
Heat pan over medium flame and lightly grease it with oil.
Pour approx 40-45 ml (1/4th cup) of batter.
Cook the pancake for 1 minute until bubbles break on top and edges begin to dry.
Flip & cook the other side for 1 minute.
Serve hot with any topping of your choice like honey, chocolate sauce, fruits, etc!

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Pillsbury Butterscotch Pancake Mix is sure to be the most loved breakfast fix at home. 

Using the Pillsbury Butterscotch Pancake Mix is the quickest method to prepare fluffy, soft, and amazingly delicious breakfast meals at home. These butterscotch pancakes are the perfect treat for breakfast, dessert, or even as a snack! Serve these pancakes with maple syrup, chopped fruit and berries, cream, or even honey to enhance flavour and enjoyment.

Explore a wide range of ready-to-cook pancake mixes, cake mixes and more from Pillsbury only on Big Basket.
Ingredients:
Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Sugar, Butterscotch Bits (7.0%)[Sugar, Edible Vegetable Fat (Hydrogenated), Iodized Salt and Artificial Flavouring Substances (Butterscotch)], Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm), Baking Powder [INS500(ii), INS541(i)], Iodized Salt, Artificial Flavouring Substances (Caramel, Butterscotch) and Raising Agent [INS500(ii)].
How to Use:
Method of Preparation - Mix all the ingredients together until uniformly blended.
Heat pan over medium flame and lightly grease it with oil. Pour approx 40-45 ml (1/4th cup) of batter.
Cook the pancake for 1 minute until bubbles break on top and edges begin to dry.
Flip & cook the other side for 1 minute.
Serve hot with any topping of your choice like honey, chocolate Sauce, fruits etc!

About the Product:
Craving for the sweet taste and rich flavour of aam ka when it isn't mango season? Look no further! Made with 100% real Alphonso mangoes, Kissan Mango Jam will leave you captivated by the sweet smell and fresh taste of Alphonso mangoes. Kissan Mango Jam is best partnered with bread to provide a delicious on-the-go breakfast for your child every morning. Think of different ways to eat it. Spread it on a crunchy cracker, roll it up in a chapatti, stir it in milk, or whip up a bread and jam delight for your child's breakfast with an assortment of flavours. Started in 1934, Kissan is a popular brand in India. Kissan is more than just jams, ketchups, and squashes. It's all about kids eating happily and growing up happily. Kissan Jam's delicious and fruit-based sweet spread keeps both mothers and kids happy. The brand's reassurance to mothers is that they can make breakfast times fun yet wholesome every morning with the Kissan range of fruit jams that are made with 100% real fruit ingredients! Remember craving for the rich flavour of Alphonso mango? This is your answer to that in a packed sweet spread bottle.

• Kissan Mango Jam is made with 100% real Alphonso fruit ingredients • Is easy to use and can be enjoyed on the go every morning • Enjoy it best with bread, roti, paratha, or dosa for a wholesome breakfast • Turns boring breakfast into an empty plate • Spreads easily with a spoon or a knife • Carefully sealed in impermeable glass packaging to retain the best flavour and taste of the product

product_desc: Frozen Green Peas - Ready To Cook
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Imagine you no longer have to make a trip to the market whenever you need some vegetables for cooking. Just head to the refrigerator and grab a pack of Farmland’s Frozen Vegetables. Brought to you by ITC, Farmland promises to make quality seasonal vegetables available for you all year long.
Farmland Frozen Green Peas gives you easy access to premium quality peas that are ready to cook. These green peas are sourced from the choicest vegetable farms in India. They are carefully handpicked, graded, and cleaned by our experts, and then processed in a state-of-the-art plant. Each pea is frozen using Individually Quick Frozen (IQF) technology, which locks in its nutrients and freshness without adding any preservatives.
Farmland’s Frozen Green Peas saves you time and makes cooking convenient as you don’t need to waste efforts shelling peas. Farmland is a trusted and affordable source of seasonal vegetables. They are perfect for making yummy homemade dishes. So, keep a pack of Frozen Green Peas handy in your freezer for cooking.
Ingredients:
Green Peas

These green peas are sourced from the choicest vegetable farms in India and have been carefully handpicked by experts.
After sourcing, they are graded, cleaned, and then frozen with Individually Quick Frozen (IQF) technology to lock in freshness and preserve their nutrition.

Farmland Frozen Vegetables are brought to you by ITC and are the trusted choice of master chefs of ITC Hotels.
All frozen vegetables from Farmland contain no added preservatives

about_the_product:

It is ready to cook noodles having good taste and gives energy when cooked. Ramyeon Noodles is the adaptation of Chinese seasoning and cooking techniques to cater to Indian tastes. Today, Noodles is an integral part of the Indian diet. Hakka label refers to the Chinese origins of the noodles. Hakka belongs to Hakka Han region and is also a language in China. When cooked, it is an apt dish for kitty parties and celebrations.
It is known by various names like Hakka noodles, desi noodles, Kims noodles, Chinese, Chowmein noodles, Korean noodles, Japanese noodles, Egg noodles.

About the Product:
Opportunities to connect with someone new happen often, but it can feel nerve-wracking and never lasts for long. Doublemints voice uses humour to reduce the tension and make you smile, all while reminding you of the joy of making connections with people.Doublemint Peppermint chewing gum gives you the confidence to let your guards down and start something fresh. This gum is specially designed for those who demand long-lasting fresh breath along with a minty blast. The bold flavours of Doublemint chewing gum come in a convenient pack that allows you to enjoy its sweet taste wherever you go.Now be fresh breath ready with Doublemint, even with the mask on! The next time you need a quick, fresh boost, pop the gum thats fresh and delightfully minty while working at home, studying, working out or even virtually meeting new people. Now with Wrigleys Doublemint, you will never miss out on that ultimate moment of connection!
Ingredients:
Sugar, Gum Base (Contains Soybean Lecithin), Glucose Syrup, Dextrose, Humectant Glycerine, Sweetener Aspartame, Emulsifier Modified Starch, Antioxidant Bha, Colours (E100, E133).
How to Use:
Pocket-friendly chewing gum pouch that fits right in your pocket.It can be enjoyed while working from home, working out in the gym or home or studying for better concentration.

product_desc: Thick Tomato Soup - 100% Real Vegetables, No Added Preservatives
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Knorr has handpicked the best quality vegetables and mixed them with spices to make delicious Knorr Thick Tomato Soup. A perfect tomato soup every time with its lip-smacking taste and the perfect consistency. Made with 100% real vegetables and no added preservatives, this soup is ready in three simple steps and serves four. So now enjoy Restaurant like delicious Soup at home. Knorr Soups range comprises 11 delicious flavours of 4 serve soups and 7 flavours of Cup-a-soup. Great taste is in our Nature! Knorr has gone to great lengths to ensure a perfect blend of ingredients and consistency that give you a Restaurant Soup at home.
About Knorr: Just like you, we love everything about food, because no delicious meal is cooked without love. Love for carefully selected ingredients, flavours and spices, or the aroma of dinner wafting through your home. Love for the people you feed every day; your family and friends, relatives and guests, the people that matter to you the most. With Knorr as your cooking partner, you can serve your loved ones nutritious and flavourful meals at home.
Soup Fun Fact - The word 'soup' is of Sanskrit origin! It is derived from the su and po, which means good nutrition.

About the Product:
Looking for a Healthy Snack that offers a unique blend of flavours? Try the Munchy Masala Karare by Too Yumm!, a crunchy and flavourful snack that excites your taste buds with a combination of tangy, spicy, and savoury flavours. Made from a blend of rice and corn grits and vegetable oil, Munchy Masala Karare provides a healthier alternative to traditional snacking options, since it is baked not fried with 40% less fats. Ideal for all occasions, this 100% vegetarian snack can be enjoyed alone or with friends and family.
This snack is gluten-free and rich in antioxidants, making it an ideal snacking option. You can trust the quality, as all Too Yumm! products go through a stringent 10-step quality check to ensure the best taste and experience. With its shelf life of six months, you can stock up on Munchy Masala Karare and enjoy this delightful snack at your convenience.

Rice Grits (48%). Corn Grits (32%). Edible Vegetable oil (Palmolein Oil). Seasoning [Maltodextrin,lodised Salt. *Spices and Condiments (Contains Onion and Garlic). Sugar, Acidity Regulator (INS 330). Nature Identical Flavouring Substances, Flavour Enhancers (INS 627. INS 691). Anticaking Agent (INS 551)].
Features:
A BURST OF FLAVOUR: The Munchy Masala flavour is a balance of tangy, spicy, and savoury, making it an ideal snack to indulge in at any time of the day
THE HEALTHY SNACK: Made from rice and corn grits, these snacks contain fewer calories and lower saturated fats, providing a healthier alternative for calorie-conscious snackers
A VEGETARIAN SNACK: Too Yumm! Munchy Masala is a 100% vegetarian snack, munchy for all dietary preferences

About the Product:
Pitted California prunes are a great ready to eat snack. They can be used for cooking as well as baking. high in soluble and insoluble fiber, they act as antioxidants. prunes play an important role in improving your digestive system by acting as a natural laxative. Besides, they also help in maintaining healthy eyes, hair, skin and nails.
As pioneers in packaged fruits with a heritage that goes back more than a century, Del Monte believes in sourcing the tastiest and best quality fruits from around the world for our consumers in India. It is this philosophy that drives us to source the juiciest Pineapple Slices and Tidbits from the Philippines; the most succulent Peach Halves imaginable from South Africa and exquisite Prunes and Cranberries from the North and South America. Del Monte Prunes are highly beneficial if consumed every day as they are rich in dietary fibre, a source of potassium and naturally low in sodium and fat

About the Product:
The filo sheets can be used in making a variety of pastry-based dishes. These sheets are very thin and easy to use, just unroll the sheets from the pack and use them as and when required. Filo is renowned for its versatility, and for this reason, it has been adopted by numerous cuisines. It can be layered, filled, folded, rolled, and turned into cups, pies, flowers, or spirals. It is also notoriously difficult to make from scratch. Switz brings to your filo dough sheets, made in Greece with the choicest ingredients by employing a proprietary process that takes away the trouble of making your own. Switz thin Filo dough can be used to make a wide variety of dishes, mostly famously baklava. We encourage you to give your imagination free rein and give your family many sweet surprises.
Benefits:

Made with premium quality ingredients only.
Peel, stuff, roll, fry and then simply relish.

Refined Wheat Flour (maida-gluten), Water, Corn Starch, Humectant (ins422), Salt.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Longing for a dessert that’ll give your day the perfect end? Look no further than Sunfeast Dark Fantasy Choco Chunks. This gourmet choco chip cookie is so extra, that even words fall short to describe its rich sensorial experience.
The sinfully delicious cookie is generously sprinkled with choco chips on the crust and tucked inside it, is a pocket of rich molten choco crème.
This is the ultimate go-to dessert for the new-age sweet tooths. Whenever you feel like the day doesn’t seem to end, grab a pack of this Dessert and escape into a Fantasy. The Dark Fantasy Choco Chunks are crafted to perfection for your Dessert cravings.

Choco Creme (34%) (Sugar, Refined Palmolein, Fetined Palm Oil, Cocoa Solids, Emulsifier (Lecithin (From Soyabean)), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances And Artificial Flavouring Substances-Vanilla), Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Sugar, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Dark Chocolate Chips (10.1%) (Sugar, Cocoa Solids, Cocos Butter, Dextrose, Emulsifier Lecithin (From Soybean)) And Artificial Flavouring Substances Vanilla), Eggs (2,5%), Imert Syrup, Liquid Glucose, Raising Agents (ins 500), Ins 4500, Ina 5031, lodized Salt, Milk Solids, Nature Identical Flavoring Substances, Emulsifier (Lecithin (From Soyabean)), Artificial Flavouring Substances (Milk, Vanilla, Coffee And Colours.

It's light and crispy and comes in a can. Enjoy On Many Occasions - Pop a can to add some crunch to lunch sandwich, indulge in a midnight munch with your favourite drink, stay energized as you game — grease-free, pack it in a picnic, it’s always more fun with Pringles Potato Chips!Stackable And Convenient - Everyone's favourite stackable chips that are kept unbroken and sealed air-tight with a freshness that pops! You can even stack 'em up to innovate your own flavour combo. Original Flavour- Sometimes simple is best - enjoy your favourite stackable chips in original, pure tantalizing flavour of salted potato - it’s good enough on its own. Unlike other potato chips, Pringles Potato Chips are made from a mix of potato, rice flour, corn flour, and wheat starch.
Ingredients:
Dried Potato (44%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm Oil), Corn Flour, Starch, Emulsifier (INS 471), Maltodextrin, Salt, Acidity Regulator (INS 330) Contains wheat

About the Product:
One of the most nutritious and popular breakfast choice. Rolled oats are made from oat groats, by steaming them to soften and then by rolling them into flakes. The process balances the healthy oils without affecting the health benefits of Oats.
By Nature Rolled Oats are the perfect companion to the early mornings when you need a head start. Gut-friendly fiber, energy-boosting carbs & anti-oxidants combine in these power-packed oats to give you essential daily nutrients. 
These nutty oats are cut thicker so you get a solid bite every time, any way you choose to consume them. They are good at making a number of other delicacies as well - from crunchy granola to gluten-free bread to upma or laddoos.
They are Highly Nutritious and  Good for Heart Health. 100% whole grain, No Preservatives.

product_desc: Mad Angles Mmmmm Masala - Corn-Based Crunchy Chips, Perfect For Snacking
about_the_product:
About the Product:
If you run away even at the slightest mention of bland food and feel that any food devoid of masala is not worth eating. We have the perfect snack for you. Satisfy your craving for something masaledaar with Bingo! Mad Angles Mmmmm Masala. This perfect triangle chip is spicy from every angle. Made from a corn base, Bingo! Mad Angles is cooked with rice and flour. This gives these spicy chips a unique texture that is just too satisfying to crunch with every bite. The chips are then evenly and generously seasoned with assorted masalas. Experience an explosion of masaledaar flavour in your mouth with every bite. Bring home a pack and go mmmmmm with these spicy chips. Dig into the pack to experience the perfectly balanced taste of crunchy Bingo! Mad Angles Mmmmm Masala. Whether you’re bored in a meeting, watching your favourite comic’s videos or waiting for your movie to buffer. A bag of Bingo! Mad Angles will always shake things up
Ingredients:
Rice Grits, seasoning Mix (refined palmolein, sugar, *Spices And condiments, iodized salt, acidity

Gram Grits And Acidity regulators (INS 500(1)]. *used as flavouring Agent.

About the Product:
Each & every bite of these momos will give you an authentic taste of hills, served with popular wow momo sauce. Momos are a kind of dumpling that is similar to Chinese potstickers. It is made from high-quality ingredients. Wow Momo brings to you Chicken Darjeeling momo that is a blend of tasty delectable chicken to create a riot of flavours in your mouth. product_USP: Source of Fiber, Calcium, Protein & Iron
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Looking for a tasty yet healthy quick meal? Sunfeast YiPPee! Power Up whole wheat atta noodles is the answer. Made with the goodness of Aashirvaad whole wheat atta, which is a source of fibre, calcium, protein, and iron. Power-up atta noodles not only give you nutrition with taste but also make for a filling, wholesome meal.
These instant noodles made with whole wheat flour are a healthier alternative to traditional instant noodles, often made with refined wheat flour. These noodles are also a hit with mothers, as they are quick and easy to prepare, making them a perfect meal solution for busy families. Plus, they are a nutritious option for growing children. So, enjoy these atta noodles when you want an easy meal between those quick meetings or whenever the whole family wants something tasty, nutritious and fast.
Infused with vegetables in every noodle strand and added real chunks of carrots and beans, you can expect a slurpy healthy bowl of noodles every time. What's more? YiPPee!'s signature delectable Indian masala flavour gives it a power-packed yummy taste, and its unique round block ensures long and non-sticky instant noodles.
Have them as a hunger pang snack in the evening, a midnight craving munch, or an energising breakfast or lunch meal packed with taste and nutrition!
Ingredients:
Instant Noodles Wheat Flour (Atta) (76%), Refined Palm Oil, Dehydrated Potato [Potato (1.9%), Stabilizer (INS 471)], lodized Salt, Acidity Regulators [INS 500 (1), INS 450 (1)], Stabilizers [INS 170(1), INS 339 (1)], Dehydrated Parsley (0.2%), Wheat Gluten, Thickener (INS 412) and Red Chilli (0.08%).
Masala Mix: Spices & Condiments (26.4%) [Garlic, Onion, Red Chilli, Ginger, Black Pepper, Cumin, Cardamom, Cassia, Clove, Turmeric and Star Anise], Dehydrated Vegetables (21.6%) [Beans, Carrot and Cabbage], lodized Salt, Instant Noodle Powder (Wheat Flour (Atta), Refined Palm Oil, Dehydrated Potato [Potato, Stabilizer (INS 471)], Todized Salt, Acidity Regulators [INS 500(1), INS 450 (0)], Stabilizers [INS 170(1), INS 339 (i)], Dehydrated Parsley, Wheat Gluten, Thickener (INS 412) and Red Chilli, Sugar, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Cheese Premix Powder (Cheese, Maltodextrin, Milk solids, lodized salt, Refined Soyabean Oil, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Emulsifier [INS 3310], Anticaking agent (INS 551), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances), Dairy Whitener (Milk Solids, Sugar and Emulsifiers [INS 339) 0, INS 3390]), Flavour Enhancers (INS 627, INS 631), Šoy Sauce Powder, Tamarind Powder [Tamarind, Anticaking agent (INS 551)], Starch, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551) and Refined Sunflower Oil.

1. No more sacrificing flavour for dietary needs - YiPPee! Power Up Atta noodles have got you covered.
2. The goodness of Aashirvaad atta in your favourite long, non-sticky & slurpy YiPPee! Noodles.
3. Vegetables infused in every noodle strand, with real veggie chunks of carrots and beans for a savoury taste.
4. A quick, delicious and nutritious meal that the whole family, especially your kids will love.
5. Delectable Indian spices combined to give you a yummy masala taste.
6. Source of Protein, Fibre, Calcium, and Iron.

product_USP: Gluten Free, Healthy Breakfast & Diet Food
about_the_product:
About the Product:
True Elements presents Rolled Oats that are loaded with health benefits and nutrients. These are lightly processed whole-grain foods before being rolled into flat flakes under heavy rollers and then stabilized by being lightly toasted. They are naturally gluten-free and free of preservatives. They are rich in protein fibre and are an excellent source of Vitamin B Complex and iron. They are the healthiest grain. Cook them with milk or water and add fruits or veggies of your choice. This makes a perfect healthy breakfast.
Benefits:
Breakfast Food: Being high in fibre content, rolled oats are good to be consumed in the morning as a breakfast to help you get started for the dayProtein Oats: Being packed with abundant plant protein, our rolled oats are highly beneficial in contributing to muscle gainOats For Weight Loss: Rolled Oats consist of dietary fibres in high quantities which make you feel fuller for a longer period of time, thus it helps in weight lossPregnancy Food: Oats contain a considerable amount of fibre. This is a godsend for all pregnant women suffering from the usual bouts of constipation as fibre helps in regulating the process of digestion and improves bowel movementSkin Care: Being rich in antioxidants, there is no entry of harmful particles entering into your body, thus enhancing skin healthImmunity Booster: Power packed with antioxidants, rolled oats can help in fighting off free radicals and save you from immunity disordersContains Prebiotics: Rolled Oats are prebiotics which promote the growth of good bacteria, thus improving the gut health
How to Use:
1. Keep it aside in boiling water overnight and let it be covered. In the morning, heat it up quickly and consume it raw. 2. You can even cook in the morning by boiling it in water for about 25-30 minutes. Add milk, honey, or sorghum or any other sweetener of your choice and garnish it with dried fruits and nuts. 3. You can also cook delicious upma or poha with oats.
Other Product Info:

about_the_product:
About the Product:
True Elements Rolled Oats are 100% whole grain oats. Being naturally gluten-free, our Oats are not at all processed or contains any preservatives. Also True Elements Whole Rolled Oats are made with 0% Added Sugar, hence can be a boon for diabetics.
Packed with High Fibre, our Rolled Oats are greatly beneficial for weight loss. These oats are good to be consumed in the morning as a breakfast to help you get started for the day.
True Elements brings to you Rolled Oats that are loaded with health benefits and nutrients. These are lightly processed whole-grain food, before being rolled into flat flakes under heavy rollers and then stabilized by being lightly toasted. It is rich in protein, fibre and is an excellent source of Vitamin B Complex and iron. It is the healthiest grain. Cook it with milk or water and add fruits or veggies for your choice. This makes a perfect healthy breakfast.
Health Benefits: HEART HEALTHY: Since it also rich in magnesium, rolled oats can be helpful in improving the heart health.
FIBRE RICH OATS: Being high in fibre content, these oats are good to be consumed in the morning as a breakfast to help you get started for the day.
ENHANCES SKIN: Due to the presence of vitamins like Vitamin B, oats can help in improving the skin health and enhancing the quality of your skin.
ANTIOXIDANT RICH: Power packed with antioxidants, rolled oats can help in fighting off the free radicals and save you from immunity disorders.
PROTEIN PACKED OATS: Packed with protein, a bowl of this wholesome oats can help in giving you extra energy to sustain throughout the day.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Enjoy a pack of joyful, chocolate-filled pillows that are crunchy on the outside and smooth on the inside with Sundrop Popz Chocolatey. Ideal snacks for those long hours of work, for those long drives across the city, and perfect for a sweet, wholesome breakfast with some milk. 

The pillowy shells are made from yummy multigrain, keeping this snack light and healthy. The insides are filled with delicious, semi-liquid chocolate that melts in your mouth. Full of fiber, and vitamin B and being cholesterol free, these chocolatey pillows are ideal for health-conscious individuals and children as well. For easy storage, this now comes with a free cereal storage box as well!

Explore a wide range of healthy snacks, bars, spreads, dips, oats, and more by Sundrop, only on Big Basket!

Ready-to-eat chocolatey pillows can be consumed straight from the packet or mix in a bowl of warm milk.
With some tea or coffee on the side, enjoy them for breakfast or as your evening snack.

About the Product:
All-time favourite snack right from late 1800?s to date, Potato Chips has been the worlds Favorite snack for all age groups. We have made this popular snack with a twist of A1 Chips MAGIC. Grab a Pack and Relish the classic salted chips at every bite. Savour the thinly sliced potatoes deep fried till golden brown and spiced right. When it comes to chips, savouries, and sweets, for the last 50+ years the name A1 Chips has stood the test of time as a hallmark of great taste and excellent quality in South India. A1 Chips can trace its origins to 1970 when Mr Subramaniam began selling chips and savouries on a small scale at the heart of Coimbatore. In 1984, his sons, Rajan, Damodaran, and Murali took a leap of faith...

Britannia Biscafe is a unique thin cracker boasting a resounding crunch and a crispy bite. Perfect for elevating your coffee break, Britannia Biscafe offers a delightful blend of texture and taste, making each sip of your favourite brew even more enjoyable. About the Product:
Relish the classic, Pringles Potato Chips in its South African Style Peri Peri flavour - the perfect snack, loved by everyone for its delicious taste and crispy texture. Uniquely Shaped - Pringles is known for its unique shape, perfectly seasoned from edge to edge, for full savoury goodness in each bite! It's light and crispy and comes in a can. Enjoy On Many Occasions - Pop a can to add some crunch to lunch sandwich, indulge in a midnight munch with your favourite drink, stay energized as you game — grease-free, pack it in a picnic, it’s always more fun with Pringles Potato Chips! Stackable And Convenient - Everyone's favourite stackable chips that are kept unbroken and sealed air-tight with a freshness that pops! You can even stack 'em up to innovate your own flavour combo. Peri Peri Flavour - Try our South African Style Peri Peri flavour! Unlike other potato chips, Pringles Potato Chips are made from a mix of potato, rice flour, corn flour, and wheat starch.
Ingredients:
Dried Potato (41 %), Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm Oil), Corn Flour, Starch, Peri Peri Seasoning (6.5%) [Maltodextrin, Salt, Sugar, Flavouring Substances (Natural & Nature Identical), Vegetable Powder (5%) (Garlic), Vinegar, Spices {Red Chilli Pepper, Cumin}, Acidity Regulator (INS 296), Flavour Enhancer (INS 635), Anticaking Agents {INS 341 (iii), 551), Spice Extracts (Green Chilli, Garlic, Paprika), Herb Extract (Oregano)], Emulsifier (INS 471), Maltodextrin, Acidity Regulator (INS 330) Contains Wheat, Soy and Milk

product_desc: YiPPee! Tricolor Pasta - Soft & Tasty Suji/Rawa, Creamy Corn
about_the_product:
About the Product:
What if we told you that your beloved pasta now has a desi twist to it? That’s right! We gave the normal pasta a tricolor twist to bring in three times the fun to your evening snack! Inviting you all to experience our Tricolor Pasta Creamy Corn, an absolute treat for pasta lovers. The lip-smacking and delicious flavours make it a favourite amongst everyone who tastes it. You’ll never stop at just one bite.
The buttery smooth taste and added corn will make you want to scoop it into your mouth! Easy to prepare and quick to finish, Sunfeast YiPPee! Tricolor Instant Pasta cooks in just under 5 minutes. It serves as the perfect hunger busting snack for when you need something quick and delicious. You can surprise your family with this desi pasta snack, we’re sure even dadi and nani will love it.
Easy on the eyes and easy to make, the kids will take a special liking to this delicious pasta snack. This instant tricolor pasta snack is truly versatile and can be enjoyed as a wholesome breakfast, a quick lunch or even as a special dinner meal. So, what are you waiting for? Get your hands on Tricolor instant pasta today! Sunfeast YiPPee! pasta also comes in a variety of other flavours! So, grab your favourite variant now!
Ingredients:
Pasta: Wheat Semolina (99.3%), Paprika Extract Powder (0.4%) [Paprika Extract, Maltodextrin And Antioxidant (INS 319)], Spinach Extract Powder (0.3%) [Spinach Extract, Maltodextrin And Thickener (INS 414)].
Creamy Corn Pasta Sauce Maker: Milk Solids:(24.3%), Refined Palm oil, Starch, Vegetable Fat Powder [Refined Palm Oil, Milk Solids, Stabilizer (INS 451(i)) And Anticaking Agent (INS 551)], Iodized Salt, Maltodextrin, Sugar, Dehydrated Garlic, Dehydrated Corn (3.8%), Yeast Extract, Onion Powder, #Spices And Condiments, Acidity Regulator [INS 331(iii)], Dehydrated Chives (0.9%) And Flavour Enhancers (INS 627, INS 631). #Used As Flavouring Agents.
Features:
Tricolor instant pasta, made with Goodness of Suji (Semolina).
Easy to make with a soft, creamy, melt-in-your-mouth texture. 
Triple the fun and flavour with 3 exciting colours of pasta.
Ready to eat in under 8 minutes.
Perfect for a delectable wholesome snack.
Also, try our Tricolor Masala variant
Nutritional Facts:

product_USP: Ready to Eat Upma with Added Vegetables, 5 Mins Instant Breakfast
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Aashirvaad Instant Meals range is packed with the promise of a taste that takes you home. Convenient and easy, these ready-to-eat Instant Meals can be made in just a few minutes.Have back-to-back meetings and don’t have the time to prepare a meal? No worries. Get a pack of Aashirvaad Instant Veggie Upma, add hot water, stir and your delicous instant meal will be ready in just 5 minutes!Enjoy your favourite food with ready to eat upma by Aashirvaad that is made with ghee. It also has the added goodness of vegetables, seasoning of mustard, cumin, curry leaves and garlic.Relish your favourite breakfast with Aashirvaad Instant Veggie Upma which will remind you the taste and goodness of your mother’s kitchen.Convenient, ready to eat and delicious in taste, Aashirvaad Instant Meals range includes Instant Khatta Meetha Poha, Instant Mini Idli Sambar and Instant Suji Halwa with Jaggery.
Features:
Instant Breakfast: Aashirvaad Instant Veggie Upma requires no cooking or preparation! Just add boiling water, stir and wait for 5 minsTasty & Healthy Upma: Vegetables, nuts, ghee are added to semolina and elevated with the seasoning of mustard, cumin, curry leaves and garlicWith Added Vegetables: Aashirvaad Instant Veggie Upma is not only tasty but also healthy as it has the added goodness of vegetablesAuthentic Flavour: Relish the flavour of Aashirvaad Instant Veggie Upma that will remind you of your mother’s kitchen with every biteReady To Eat: Enjoy your favourite breakfast anytime, anywhere with this instant meal by Aashirvaad

product_desc: Multigrain Energy Bar Chocolate Chunk Vanilla
about_the_product:
From the Brand:
About the ProductGoodDiet is here with so much more than just taste and health. We are here with Multi-Grain Energy Bar - Chocolate Chunk Vanilla. Now, that’s what we call a tasty and wholesome bar. To match the day-to-day hustled routine and keep the energy up, we bring you this bar to the job. It’s loaded with rich ingredients like rolled oats, honey, brown rice flakes, dark chocolate, peanuts, rice crisps, watermelon seeds, sunflower seeds, pearl millet flakes, chia seeds, ragi flakes and dates.
This super nutritious and tasty bar is rich in protein, carbs, and fibre. Its prebiotic quality helps the growth of beneficial bacteria in the stomach to aid digestion and gut health. From athletes, fitness freaks, students, moms to anyone who has a rigorous day, this bar helps keep that energy high and body healthy.
Ingredients:
Rolled Oats, Natural Honey, Brown Rice Flakes, Dark Chocolate, Peanuts, Rice Crisps, Pearl Millet Flakes, Watermelon Seeds, Sunflower Oil, Sunflower Seeds, Ragi Flakes, Chia Seeds, Dates, Rock Salt, Vanilla Flavour.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Discover Authentic Indian Flavor with Too Yumm Bikaneri Bhujia Transport your taste buds to the heart of Rajasthan with Too Yumm Bikaneri Bhujia—an iconic Indian snack renowned for its irresistible blend of spices and textures. Crafted with expertise and passion, each bite of our Bikaneri Bhujia is a culinary journey through the vibrant streets of Bikaner, where tradition meets innovation to create a snack unlike any other.
Made from the finest quality ingredients, our Bikaneri Bhujia boasts a perfect balance of flavors and textures. Crisp, golden strands of gram flour noodles are delicately seasoned with a symphony of aromatic spices to create a tantalizing fusion of heat and tanginess that will leave your taste buds tingling with delight. Whether you're hosting a festive gathering, enjoying a day at home, need some accompaniment with your meal, or simply craving a savory snack to accompany your tea, our Bikaneri Bhujia is the perfect choice for a Healthy snack.
Its light and crispy texture make it addictive to snack on, while its bold and robust flavors make it a true crowd-pleaser. Indulge in the authentic taste of Rajasthan with our Bikaneri Bhujia, proudly made using traditional recipes passed down through generations. Each batch is crafted with care and attention to detail, ensuring that every bite is packed with the rich heritage and culinary expertise of this iconic Indian snack. So, elevate your snacking experience with the bold flavors of Too Yumm Bikaneri Bhujia. Whether you're a fan of spicy snacks or simply appreciate the finer things in life, our Bikaneri Bhujia promises to satisfy your cravings and leave you craving for more. Try it today and experience the true taste of India!
Ingredients:
Tepary Bean (Moth Bean) Flour, Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Gram Flour, Iodised Salt, Red Chilli Powder, Clove Powder, Black Pepper, Ginger Powder, Cardamom, Bay Leaf Powder, Nutmeg And Cinnamon Powder.

product_desc: Organic Apple Cider Vinegar - Raw, Unfiltered & Unpasteurised, Boosts Immunity
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Wow Life Science Apple Cider Vinegar is pure, unfiltered & unpasteurised is made from 100% cold-pressed natural apple juice (not concentrate). It is prepared by fermenting the juice up to 4% acidity over 8 months in a slow process. It comes with a natural ‘mother of vinegar’ content. Apple cider vinegar is an antiviral, antifungal, anti-septic and anti-glycemic. It is rich in healthy vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and enzymes. It has numerous uses as a health, wellness and beauty aid. Organic apple cider vinegar is a general tonic that helps boost overall health. It is made from the juice of the finest of Himalayan apples (not concentrate).
Ingredients:
Apple Cider Vinegar.
Nutritional Facts:
As Per - 100 ml

Energy - 9.57 kcal
Protein - 0.11 g
Fat - 0.05 g
Carbohydrate - 2.17 g
Dietary Fibre - 0.08 g
Sugar - 0 g
Sodium - 17.025 mg
Potassium - 81.236 mg
Iron - 1.155 mg
Calcium - 9.806 mg
Phosphorus - 20.86 mg
Vitamin C - 4.6 mg
How to Use:
Dilute 1 tbsp. of apple cider vinegar with an equal amount of water. Gargle with it.
You can dip a cotton bud in this solution and rub your yellow-stained teeth with it to get it clean.
Pour 1-2 tbsp. of apple cider vinegar into warm water and soak your feet in it. Then, clean them with a pumice stone.
Dilute apple cider vinegar with an equal amount of water.
Apply on the skin to control acne, bruises, sunburn or rashes. Leave it overnight.
To cure dandruff, apply this solution to your scalp. Massage. Leave it overnight. Wash it off in the morning.
To whiten discoloured nails, apply apple cider vinegar with a cotton bud. Leave it overnight. Wash it off in the morning.
To remove warts, place a cotton ball soaked in apple cider vinegar on top, hold it secure with a band-aid. Leave it overnight.
Repeat for a few days/weeks till the wart comes off.
Other Product Info:

About the Product:
Unwrap the joy of sibling love with the Best of Minis! Are you searching for a gift that offers a little bit of everything for your sibling with a sweet tooth this Rakhi? Introducing the Best of Mixed Minis Chocolate Rakhi Gift Pack, a treasure trove of indulgent treats in one place, promising a delightful surprise with every bite! These mouth-watering mixed minis chocolates are crafted with the finest ingredients, promising a luxurious and indulgent experience. The pack includes four types of chocolates – Snickers Miniature with roasted peanuts, nougat, and caramel, a perfect solution for mini hunger pangs. Twix chocolate offers a delightful fusion of crunchy cookies, smooth caramel, and creamy chocolate. Galaxy Smooth Milk Minis are a rich and creamy delight, loaded with the goodness of milk and cocoa. Bounty Miniature features tender coconut in the centre, coated in a decadent layer of milk chocolate, offering an irresistible treat. Sharing these mini chocolates is a wonderful way to celebrate sweet moments with your siblings during Rakhi. The Best of Minis chocolate family pack is best enjoyed while exchanging Rakhi gifts, during the Rakhi ceremony, or as a delightful treat after the festive meal. Whether it's sharing these mini treats with your brothers and sisters or using these chocolates to express love and affection on Rakhi, this chocolate gift pack is perfect for celebrating the special bond between siblings!

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Slurrp Farm No Maida Macaroni Pasta is the perfect meal for you and your kids. Made with Brown Rice and Corn which are a great source of dietary fibre, B-vitamins, and essential fatty acids, this Slurrp Farm Macaroni Pasta is the ideal choice for your home. This pasta is vegan and gluten-free making it safe for all to consume. Enjoy the delicious taste of Italian delicacies at home without compromising on your diet. These are low-calorie pasta that just needs to be boiled for 7-8 minutes and they're cooked. Make the authentic Mac & Cheese or toss it in with red sauce for a twist. Explore the range of Slurrp Farm Vegan and gluten-free pasta and snacks only on Big Basket.

Multigrain Blend (86%) (Corn, Brown Rice, White Rice), Tapioca Starch (13%), Guar Gum.

Salt-0g

Boil 1L water with a tsp of salt in a wide pan.
Add 1 cup (100g) of dry pasta and continue cooking on high heat for 9-10 minutes.

Toss this in a pan with your choice of sauce and some veggies and serve hot.

product_desc: K-Pot Korean Ramen - Spicy Jjajangmyeon Veg Meal
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Ride the new Korean Food Wave with Knorr Korean veg meal in 2 exciting spicy flavours - Kimchi and Jjajangmyeon - that are deliciously magical. Our ramen noodles are thick & chewy, which is the hallmark style of Korean ramen. Our Kimchi and Jjajang flavours are expertly crafted to deliver a complex spicy, sour & umami flavour, that will make your mouth water with every bite. Packed with 9g of protein and chunky vegetables, while being completely free from preservatives. The make instructions are illustrated in detail so that you don’t go wrong even if it’s your first time or you don’t know how to cook. All you need is 5 minutes to get a Restaurant-like Korean meal experience, in the comfort of your home. Let the fiery taste of our Korean Veg Meal complement the intense drama unfolding on screen, creating a complete Korean experience that's bound to satisfy your cravings and transport you to a world of delectable delight.
Knorr: Just like you, we love everything about food, because no delicious meal is cooked without love. Love for carefully selected Ingredients, flavours and spices, or the aroma of dinner wafting through your home. Love for the people you feed every day; your family and friends, relatives and guests, the people that matter to you the most. With Knorr as your cooking partner, you can serve your loved ones nutritious and flavourful meals at home.
Ingredients:
Noodles: Refined Wheat Flour (Maida), Thickener - 1420, Palm Oil/Palmolein, Wheat Gluten, Potato Starch, Iodised Salt, Yeast, Acidity Regulator - 500(I) And 501(I), Texturizer - 451(I). Seasoning: Sugar, Flavour Enhancer - 627 & 631, Iodised Salt, Food Colour - Caramel I, Potato Starch
Flavours - Nature Identical Flavouring Substances (Soya Sauce), # Dehydrated Vegetables (Garlic (0.8%), Ginger), Chilli Powder (0.9%), Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Anticaking Agent - 551, Maltodextrin, Oleoresin Chillies, Acidity Regulator330. # Dehydrated Vegetables (2.7%) : Cabbage, Spring Onion, Mushroom, Broccoli, Bell Pepper, Zucchini.
How to Use:
1. Boil approx. 3 cups (425ml) of water in a pan.
2. Add noodles and veggies and cook for 5 minutes while stirring.
3. Turn off the gas, add Jjajangmyeon Seasoning and mix well.
Pro tip : Make it more nutritious by adding tofu, mushroom and sesame seeds. Non-Veg lovers can add poached egg instead of Tofu.
Other Product Info:

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Yogabar's Energy Bars contain a nutrient-dense primary ingredient that is generally whole grains, nuts or seeds. The bar contains 25 - 30% Whole grains & complex carbs, derived from Brown rice, Oats, Buckwheat, etc. 10 - 15% Nuts, that is generally Almonds, Cashews or Peanuts, as they provide all-round more protein and fibre. Lastly, it contains 10 - 15% Seeds, which are generally Flax, Chia, Sunflower, etc. The bars contain no corn syrup, artificial sweeteners or hydrogenated oils. It also contains no artificial preservatives, as Yoga Bar chooses to focus on the long-term health of their consumers, rather than a product that can last years on the shelf. Flavour: Vanilla Almond. product_desc: 17 g High Protein Oats - With Probiotics, Dark Chocolate Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
You can rest easy with MuscleBlaze High Protein Oats with Probiotics which is un-berry-ably good and defi-nut-ly awesome  for your crazy mornings! It is great for vegetarians or anyone looking to add more protein to their diet, it provides 17 g protein per serving with 250 ml of skimmed milk. It is a vegetarian source of protein that is also high in fibre and antioxidants. This healthy breakfast cereal is loaded with nutrition with 13.5% of fruits & seeds and 11.5% of fibre per 100 g. These rolled oats contain superseeds like chia and pumpkin seeds which contain good fats that help improve cholesterol levels and enhance overall health. High fibre helps to maintain bowel movement and benefits heart health. Both protein and fibre are fulfilling so you are likely to eat less which is great for weight management. MuscleBlaze High Protein Oats are loaded with probiotics to enhance gut health and restore the natural balance of gut bacteria to keep you healthy. Probiotics also help in better nutrient digestion and absorption. Enjoy your rolled oats in a delicious dark chocolate flavour!
Ingredients:
Rolled Oats (47.4%), Texturised Soy Protein (20%), Fruit & Seeds (13.5%) {Raisins, Chia Seeds, Pumpkin Seeds}, Raw Sugar (11%), Cocoa Solids (7%), Artificial (Chocolate) Flavouring Substance, Pink Salt, Probiotic ( Bacillus Coagulans MTCC 5856 ) & Antioxidant (INS 320)
How to Use:
For every cup of Oats (50g), add 1 1/2 cups (250m1) of water/milk in a pan. Cook for 3 minutes on a medium flame or microwave for 3 minutes on full power.

product_desc: Potato Chips Desi Masala Tadka Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Relish the classic, Pringles Potato Chips in its Desi Masala Tadka flavour - the perfect snack, loved by everyone for its delicious taste and crispy texture. Uniquely Shaped - Pringles is known for its unique shape, perfectly seasoned from edge to edge, for full savoury goodness in each bite! It's light and crispy and comes in a can.Enjoy On Many Occasions - Pop a can to add some crunch to lunch sandwich, indulge in a midnight munch with your favourite drink, stay energized as you game — grease-free, pack it in a picnic, it’s always more fun with Pringles Potato Chips! Stackable And Convenient - Everyone's favourite stackable chips that are kept unbroken and sealed air-tight with a freshness that pops! You can even stack 'em up to innovate your own flavour combo. Desi Masala Tadka Flavour - Try our Desi Masala Tadka flavour! Unlike other potato chips, Pringles Potato Chips are made from a mix of potato, rice flour, corn flour, and wheat starch.

From the Brand:
About the ProductBring the authentic taste of Italian cuisine to your kitchen with HappyChef 100% Durum Wheat Pasta - Penne Rigate! Made from semolina and durum wheat, this pasta contains 0% maida to give you a healthy eating experience. Al dente when cooked, the classic shape of penne pasta is well loved around the world and its bound to fill you right up. Explore HappyChef products including their line of healthy pastas on BigBasket!
Features
Made from 100% durum wheat semolina | Uses no maida | Classic Italian penne shape | No trans fat
Ingredients:
Durum Wheat & Semolina
How to Use:
Step 1 - Use 5 litres of water for 500g of pasta. (Add salt as per your preference to flavour the pasta).
Step 2 - Add pasta to the boiling water and stir occasionally. Follow the cooking time shown on the pack.
Step 3 - Once cooked, drain the hot water and rinse it gently with cold water to keep the texture and avoid stickiness.
Step 4 - Add the desired sauce and your choice of cooked veggies. Stir it gently till the pasta and sauce combine well.
Note: If you prefer to cook the pasta in the pan, drain the water a few minutes before the shown cooking time to avoid overcooking.
